_sText:
If I have not credited you for something you did, please leave a comment below or send me a message saying so.
-------------------------------------------------------------------

Basically you're all stuck in a room on "The Grand Spaceship", and someone hits the "Self Destruct" button (someone has to hit it to leave the room). So your goal is to run to the escape pods before the ship blows up!

Yes, I know its corny, it's suppost to be.

-------------------------------------------------------------------

The theme is space, so I tried making a lot of the obstacles with some sort of aspect of space.

OBSTACLES:

- Jump over moving blocks
- Fan
- Rock jump (low gravity)
- Lasers
- Fan pushing up
- Strafe down
- Outside jumping (only have 15s)
- Doors crush you
- Lasers with moving platform and fan
- Upward Strafe
- Forward Strafe
- Jumping
- Lasers

-------------------------------------------------------------------

Once you beat the end, you will be able to play the Goldeneye theme song or get speed for the next round (Only lasts one round).

-------------------------------------------------------------------

**FIXES FOR V2**

- Fix lasers cheat/glitch
- Add more to the end
- Fix spawn killer
- Add more secret nades
- Smooth out some traps
- Make song only play for one round
- Fix old gravity glitch from "!restart"
- Fix the nodraw on the sign in spawn
